body_html:
Hello @achowdhery,

Thank you for your reply. Yes, I had changed the mentioned lines in the DetectorActivity.Java filE ( This was mentioned in first response to your question). However, as mentioned for ssd_mobilenet_v2 the app is getting closed after 10 sec.

I am currently training with the quantized model (the one from tensorflow zoo , ssd_mobilenet_v1_quantized). I will share the details with you people.

I wonder if one can convert float type model (for example ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco and ssd_mobilenet_v2_coco) into qunatized one by following some modifications in the scripts. Whats your suggestion?
body_text:
Hello @achowdhery,
Thank you for your reply. Yes, I had changed the mentioned lines in the DetectorActivity.Java filE ( This was mentioned in first response to your question). However, as mentioned for ssd_mobilenet_v2 the app is getting closed after 10 sec.
I am currently training with the quantized model (the one from tensorflow zoo , ssd_mobilenet_v1_quantized). I will share the details with you people.
I wonder if one can convert float type model (for example ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco and ssd_mobilenet_v2_coco) into qunatized one by following some modifications in the scripts. Whats your suggestion?
body:
Hello @achowdhery,

Thank you for your reply. Yes, I had changed the mentioned lines in the DetectorActivity.Java filE ( This was mentioned in first response to your question). However, as mentioned for ssd_mobilenet_v2 the app is getting closed after 10 sec. 

I am currently training with the quantized model (the one from tensorflow zoo , ssd_mobilenet_v1_quantized). I will share the details with you people.

I wonder if one can convert float type model (for example ssd_mobilenet_v1_coco and ssd_mobilenet_v2_coco) into qunatized one by following some modifications in the scripts. Whats your suggestion?
